channel.title: Hometown Tales Vidcast (Videos)
channel.description: Every Town Has One- Local Legends, Folklore, Ghost Stories, Odd Culture. This is a video feed taken from the popular underground public access show. Tune in to see your town's tales.
channel.itunes:subtitle: Every Town Has One- Local Legends, Folklore, Ghost Stories, Odd Culture.
channel.itunes:summary: Every Town Has One- Local Legends, Folklore, Ghost Stories, Odd Culture. This is a video feed taken from the popular underground public access show. Tune in to see your town's tales.
channel.itunes:keywords: hometown tales, videos, ghosts, videos, paranormal, tales, legends, video, folklore
channel.itunes:author: Hometown Tales
channel.itunes:name: Gene and Bryan

item.title: HT Vidcast #8- The Legend of La Llorona
item.description: This ghostly legend has haunted people from South America, through Mexico into the Southwest U.S. Watch the Sante Fe version of the tale as Bryan heads back to his hometown to capture their tale of the "Wailing Woman" of the River.

item.description: One of our most popular segments from the Public Access Years. The strange Jersey delicacy of Pork Roll sandwiches, some call it "taylor ham". Find out why and how everyone eats it.

item.title: HT Vidcast #5-The World's Oldest Roller Coaster
item.description: Take a full screen video ride on "Leap the Dips", the world's oldest rollercoaster. It wasn't fast, it wasn't high but that doesn't mean Bryan wasn't scared.

item.title: HT Vidcast #4-Attack From Mars
